params.taskDescription:
Write the set containing the elements in sets <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>or</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mi>Q</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B\,{\text{or}}\,Q</annotation></semantics></math>.

params.taskDescription:
Find the cardinality of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>C</mi>
  <mo>∪<!-- ∪ --></mo>
  <mi>R</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mi>n</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mi>C</mi>
  <mo>∪<!-- ∪ --></mo>
  <mi>R</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">C \cup R,\,n(C \cup R)</annotation></semantics></math>.

params.taskDescription:
Find <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>n</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mi>S</mi>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>union</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mi>R</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">n(S\,{\text{union}}\,R)</annotation></semantics></math>.

questionSetStimulus:
Determine the union and intersection of the sets indicated:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>U</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>b</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>c</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mo>…<!-- … --></mo>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>z</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">U = \{ a,b,c, \ldots ,z\}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>S</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>s</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>c</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>b</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>l</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>e</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">S = \{s,c,r,a,b,l,e\}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>b</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>c</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>e</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B = \{b,r,a,c,e\}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>C</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>c</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>b</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">C = \{c,r,a,b\}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>R</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>i</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>s</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>k</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">R = \{r,i,s,k\}</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>Q</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>q</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>u</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>i</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>z</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">Q = \{q,u,i,z\}</annotation></semantics></math>.
